25.eng-name: The Office of the Judge (Kitab Al-Aqdiyah)

hadiths.text: Abu hurairah reported the holy prophet (peace be upon him) as saying:When two men dislike the oath or like it,lots will be cost about it. Salamah said on the authority of Ma’mar who said: when the two are compelled to take an oath

chapter.ara-name: باب الرَّجُلَيْنِ يَدَّعِيَانِ شَيْئًا وَلَيْسَتْ لَهُمَا بَيِّنَةٌ
chapter.eng-name: Two men who claim something but have no proof
